description: Cuddly Sensitive Concentrated Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner 2L 80 Washes Gentle on Sensitive Skin Hypoallergenic Dermatologist Tested and is a Sensitive Choice Proud Supporter of the Eczema Association Australasia Inc Designed for Luxurious Softness Easy Iron Reduces wrinkles Reduces Static Helps clothes look newer for longer and Fast DryingCuddly Concentrate Hypoallergenic Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner is gentle on sensitive skin.Delicate skin needs the gentlest touch which is why weve formulated Cuddly Sensitive Its hypoallergenic has been dermatologically tested and contains no dyes Cuddly Sensitive gives that little bit extra to show you care. Luxurious Softness Gentle Fragrance Hypoallergenic Dermatologically tested Free from dyes Sensitive Choice Proud supporter of the Eczema Association Australasia EAA Grey Water and Septic Tank safe 100 recyclable packagingDirections for useTop Loader  Cuddly can be added to your machines fabric conditioner dispensing unit or diluted and added to the final rinse Front Loader  Add Cuddly to your machines fabric conditioner dispenser unit only This is often marked with a flowerCuddly is ready to use so there is no need to dilute Never pour directly onto fabricsSize 2L Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner ConcentrateWashes 80 washesFABRIC SOFTENER CONDITIONER Cuddly Concentrate Sensitive Liquid Fabric Softener Conditioner is gentle on sensitive skinHYPOALLERGENIC AND DERMATOLOGICALLY TESTED Cuddly Concentrate Sensitive fabric conditioner is hypoallergenic and dermatologically testedDELICATE ON SENSITIVE SKIN Cuddly Sensitive fabric conditioner is a Sensitive Choice Proud supporter of Eczema Association Australasia IncFREE FROM any dyes and has a gentle fragrance
name: Cuddly Concentrate Fabric Conditioner Hypoallergenic Sensitive 2L
